#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
int MOD=1000000007;
int facto[800001];
int inverse[800001];
inline ll power(int a,int b)
{
    if(b==0)
        return(1);
    ll t=power(a,b/2);
    t=((ll)t*t)%MOD;
    return((b%2)?(a*t)%MOD:t);
}
inline ll modInverse(int a)
{
    return(power(a,MOD-2));
}
int main()
{
    inverse[0]=1;
    facto[0]=1;
    for(int i=1;i<800001;i++){
        facto[i]=((ll)i*facto[i-1])%MOD;
        inverse[i]=modInverse(facto[i]);
    }
    int d,p,q,r,s;
    ll sum,a,b;
    scanf("%d,",&d);
    while(d--)
    {
        scanf("%d%d%d%d",&p,&q,&r,&s);
        sum=0;
        for(int i=0;i<=p-r;i++)
        {
            a=((ll)facto[i+s-1]*(((ll)inverse[i]*inverse[s-1])%MOD))%MOD;//Upper Block
            b=((ll)facto[p-i+q-s]*(((ll)inverse[p-i]*inverse[q-s])%MOD))%MOD;//Lower Block
            //cout<<a<<" "<<b<<"\n";
            sum=(sum+(a*b)%MOD)%MOD;
        }
        printf("%lld\n",sum);
    }
}
